verses.content: LALPA chu inpâk ro, Pathien chu a hmun inthienga chun inpâk unla, A thilthawtheina boruok lientaka khin ama chu inpâk ro.
A thilthaw ropuitakhai leiin ama chu inpâk unla, A ropui nasatzie ang peiin ama chu inpâk ro.
Tawtawrâwt riin ama chu inpâk unla, Perkhuong le ṭingṭangin ama chu inpâk ro.
Khuongtê le lâmin ama chu inpâk unla, Ṭingṭang chi tum tum le theihlein ama chu inpâk ro.
Dârbenthek ri thûm miin ama chu inpâk unla, Dârbenthek ri infiek miin ama chu inpâk ro.
Iengkim inthuokthei taphawt chun LALPA chu inpâk raw se. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
